column4: sftp from the shell - how do I delete a directory that has files in it? I keep getting "Failure".
Couldn't stat remote file: No such file or directory
Couldn't delete file: No such file or directory
What's the command for deleting a given dir, and all its contents, from an SFTP server?
if you have SFTP you probably have ssh. just use the shell.
run a cron job on the local host to move things.
the SFTP syntax is the same as FTP
what do you want to do?
read and post to Usenet? sudo apt-get install pan
